_meanings:
{@--1@} To 
approach, come or draw near, go up
to (with <ab>acc.</ab>) {#asmAnattumito'Byeti#}
<ls>Bk. 7. 84.</ls>; <ls>Ki. 2. 54.</ls>

{@--2@} To
go along or after, follow, serve.

{@--4@} To get, meet with, fall into,
suffer, undergo (said of good or
bad things); {#kAryaM saMsidDimaByeti#} <ls>Pt. 1.</ls>
